list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: scatter the coconut over the icing

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a group of people or animals) separate and move off quickly in different directions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the roar made the dogs scatter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tiếng gầm làm cho những con chó phân tán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: deflect or diffuse (electromagnetic radiation or particles).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the light is scattered as it strikes particles suspended in the air
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ánh sáng nằm rải rác khi nó tấn công các hạt lơ lửng trong không khí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a pitcher) allow (several hits) at intervals so as to result in little or no scoring.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Fernandez struck out 14 while scattering three hits over eight scoreless innings
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Fernandez đánh ra 14 trong khi phân tán ba lượt truy cập trên tám hiệp không có điểm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small, dispersed amount of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a scatter of houses on the north shore
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một ngôi nhà rải rác trên bờ phía bắc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the degree to which repeated measurements or observations of a quantity differ.
the scattering of light, other electromagnetic radiation, or particles.
